price: ለእነርሱም ለአልረሕማን ስገዱ በተባሉ ጊዜ አልረሕማን ማነው? ለምታዘን (እና ለማናውቀው) እንሰግዳለን? ይላሉ፡፡ (ይህ) መራቅንም ጨመራቸው፡፡
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ قَالُواْ وَمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ أَنَسۡجُدُ لِمَا تَأۡمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمۡ نُفُورٗا۩

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu us'judū lilrraḥmāni qālū wamā al-raḥmānu anasjudu limā tamurunā wazādahum nufūran
